00043 #ifdef DEBUG_PERSISTENCY
00044 #include <stdio.h>
00045 void    btPersistentManifold::DebugPersistency()
00046 {
00047         int i;
00048         printf("DebugPersistency : numPoints %d\n",m_cachedPoints);
00049         for (i=0;i<m_cachedPoints;i++)
00050         {
00051                 printf("m_pointCache[%d].m_userPersistentData = %x\n",i,m_pointCache[i].m_userPersistentData);
00052         }
00053 }
00054 #endif //DEBUG_PERSISTENCY
00055 
00056 void btPersistentManifold::clearUserCache(btManifoldPoint& pt)
00057 {
00058 
00059         void* oldPtr = pt.m_userPersistentData;
00060         if (oldPtr)
00061         {
00062 #ifdef DEBUG_PERSISTENCY
00063                 int i;
00064                 int occurance = 0;
00065                 for (i=0;i<m_cachedPoints;i++)
00066                 {
00067                         if (m_pointCache[i].m_userPersistentData == oldPtr)
00068                         {
00069                                 occurance++;
00070                                 if (occurance>1)
00071                                         printf("error in clearUserCache\n");
00072                         }
00073                 }
00074                 btAssert(occurance<=0);
00075 #endif //DEBUG_PERSISTENCY
00076 
00077                 if (pt.m_userPersistentData && gContactDestroyedCallback)
00078                 {
00079                         (*gContactDestroyedCallback)(pt.m_userPersistentData);
00080                         pt.m_userPersistentData = 0;
00081                 }
00082                 
00083 #ifdef DEBUG_PERSISTENCY
00084                 DebugPersistency();
00085 #endif
00086         }
00087 
00088         
00089 }
00090 
00091 static inline btScalar calcArea4Points(const btVector3 &p0,const btVector3 &p1,const btVector3 &p2,const btVector3 &p3)
00092 {
00093         // It calculates possible 3 area constructed from random 4 points and returns the biggest one.
00094 
00095         btVector3 a[3],b[3];
00096         a[0] = p0 - p1;
00097         a[1] = p0 - p2;
00098         a[2] = p0 - p3;
00099         b[0] = p2 - p3;
00100         b[1] = p1 - p3;
00101         b[2] = p1 - p2;
00102 
00103         //todo: Following 3 cross production can be easily optimized by SIMD.
00104         btVector3 tmp0 = a[0].cross(b[0]);
00105         btVector3 tmp1 = a[1].cross(b[1]);
00106         btVector3 tmp2 = a[2].cross(b[2]);
00107 
00108         return btMax(btMax(tmp0.length2(),tmp1.length2()),tmp2.length2());
00109 }
00110 
00111 int btPersistentManifold::sortCachedPoints(const btManifoldPoint& pt) 
00112 {
00113                 //calculate 4 possible cases areas, and take biggest area
00114                 //also need to keep 'deepest'
00115                 
00116                 int maxPenetrationIndex = -1;
00117 #define KEEP_DEEPEST_POINT 1
00118 #ifdef KEEP_DEEPEST_POINT
00119                 btScalar maxPenetration = pt.getDistance();
00120                 for (int i=0;i<4;i++)
00121                 {
00122                         if (m_pointCache[i].getDistance() < maxPenetration)
00123                         {
00124                                 maxPenetrationIndex = i;
00125                                 maxPenetration = m_pointCache[i].getDistance();
00126                         }
00127                 }
00128 #endif //KEEP_DEEPEST_POINT
00129                 
00130                 btScalar res0(btScalar(0.)),res1(btScalar(0.)),res2(btScalar(0.)),res3(btScalar(0.));
00131 
00132         if (gContactCalcArea3Points)
00133         {
00134                 if (maxPenetrationIndex != 0)
00135                 {
00136                         btVector3 a0 = pt.m_localPointA-m_pointCache[1].m_localPointA;
00137                         btVector3 b0 = m_pointCache[3].m_localPointA-m_pointCache[2].m_localPointA;
00138                         btVector3 cross = a0.cross(b0);
00139                         res0 = cross.length2();
00140                 }
00141                 if (maxPenetrationIndex != 1)
00142                 {
00143                         btVector3 a1 = pt.m_localPointA-m_pointCache[0].m_localPointA;
00144                         btVector3 b1 = m_pointCache[3].m_localPointA-m_pointCache[2].m_localPointA;
00145                         btVector3 cross = a1.cross(b1);
00146                         res1 = cross.length2();
00147                 }
00148 
00149                 if (maxPenetrationIndex != 2)
00150                 {
00151                         btVector3 a2 = pt.m_localPointA-m_pointCache[0].m_localPointA;
00152                         btVector3 b2 = m_pointCache[3].m_localPointA-m_pointCache[1].m_localPointA;
00153                         btVector3 cross = a2.cross(b2);
00154                         res2 = cross.length2();
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 if (maxPenetrationIndex != 3)
00158                 {
00159                         btVector3 a3 = pt.m_localPointA-m_pointCache[0].m_localPointA;
00160                         btVector3 b3 = m_pointCache[2].m_localPointA-m_pointCache[1].m_localPointA;
00161                         btVector3 cross = a3.cross(b3);
00162                         res3 = cross.length2();
00163                 }
00164         } 
00165         else
00166         {
00167                 if(maxPenetrationIndex != 0) {
00168                         res0 = calcArea4Points(pt.m_localPointA,m_pointCache[1].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[2].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[3].m_localPointA);
00169                 }
00170 
00171                 if(maxPenetrationIndex != 1) {
00172                         res1 = calcArea4Points(pt.m_localPointA,m_pointCache[0].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[2].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[3].m_localPointA);
00173                 }
00174 
00175                 if(maxPenetrationIndex != 2) {
00176                         res2 = calcArea4Points(pt.m_localPointA,m_pointCache[0].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[1].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[3].m_localPointA);
00177                 }
00178 
00179                 if(maxPenetrationIndex != 3) {
00180                         res3 = calcArea4Points(pt.m_localPointA,m_pointCache[0].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[1].m_localPointA,m_pointCache[2].m_localPointA);
00181                 }
00182         }
00183         btVector4 maxvec(res0,res1,res2,res3);
00184         int biggestarea = maxvec.closestAxis4();
00185         return biggestarea;
00186         
00187 }

00189 
00190 int btPersistentManifold::getCacheEntry(const btManifoldPoint& newPoint) const
00191 {
00192         btScalar shortestDist =  getContactBreakingThreshold() * getContactBreakingThreshold();
00193         int size = getNumContacts();
00194         int nearestPoint = -1;
00195         for( int i = 0; i < size; i++ )
00196         {
00197                 const btManifoldPoint &mp = m_pointCache[i];
00198 
00199                 btVector3 diffA =  mp.m_localPointA- newPoint.m_localPointA;
00200                 const btScalar distToManiPoint = diffA.dot(diffA);
00201                 if( distToManiPoint < shortestDist )
00202                 {
00203                         shortestDist = distToManiPoint;
00204                         nearestPoint = i;
00205                 }
00206         }
00207         return nearestPoint;
00208 }
00209 
00210 int btPersistentManifold::addManifoldPoint(const btManifoldPoint& newPoint, bool isPredictive)
00211 {
00212         if (!isPredictive)
00213         {
00214                 btAssert(validContactDistance(newPoint));
00215         }
00216         
00217         int insertIndex = getNumContacts();
00218         if (insertIndex == MANIFOLD_CACHE_SIZE)
00219         {
00220 #if MANIFOLD_CACHE_SIZE >= 4
00221                 //sort cache so best points come first, based on area
00222                 insertIndex = sortCachedPoints(newPoint);
00223 #else
00224                 insertIndex = 0;
00225 #endif
00226                 clearUserCache(m_pointCache[insertIndex]);
00227                 
00228         } else
00229         {
00230                 m_cachedPoints++;
00231 
00232                 
00233         }
00234         if (insertIndex<0)
00235                 insertIndex=0;
00236 
00237         btAssert(m_pointCache[insertIndex].m_userPersistentData==0);
00238         m_pointCache[insertIndex] = newPoint;
00239         return insertIndex;
00240 }
00241 
00242 btScalar        btPersistentManifold::getContactBreakingThreshold() const
00243 {
00244         return m_contactBreakingThreshold;
00245 }

00249 void btPersistentManifold::refreshContactPoints(const btTransform& trA,const btTransform& trB)
00250 {
00251         int i;
00252 #ifdef DEBUG_PERSISTENCY
00253         printf("refreshContactPoints posA = (%f,%f,%f) posB = (%f,%f,%f)\n",
00254                 trA.getOrigin().getX(),
00255                 trA.getOrigin().getY(),
00256                 trA.getOrigin().getZ(),
00257                 trB.getOrigin().getX(),
00258                 trB.getOrigin().getY(),
00259                 trB.getOrigin().getZ());
00260 #endif //DEBUG_PERSISTENCY
00262         for (i=getNumContacts()-1;i>=0;i--)
00263         {
00264                 btManifoldPoint &manifoldPoint = m_pointCache[i];
00265                 manifoldPoint.m_positionWorldOnA = trA( manifoldPoint.m_localPointA );
00266                 manifoldPoint.m_positionWorldOnB = trB( manifoldPoint.m_localPointB );
00267                 manifoldPoint.m_distance1 = (manifoldPoint.m_positionWorldOnA -  manifoldPoint.m_positionWorldOnB).dot(manifoldPoint.m_normalWorldOnB);
00268                 manifoldPoint.m_lifeTime++;
00269         }
00270 
00272         btScalar distance2d;
00273         btVector3 projectedDifference,projectedPoint;
00274         for (i=getNumContacts()-1;i>=0;i--)
00275         {
00276                 
00277                 btManifoldPoint &manifoldPoint = m_pointCache[i];
00278                 //contact becomes invalid when signed distance exceeds margin (projected on contactnormal direction)
00279                 if (!validContactDistance(manifoldPoint))
00280                 {
00281                         removeContactPoint(i);
00282                 } else
00283                 {
00284             //todo: friction anchor may require the contact to be around a bit longer
00285                         //contact also becomes invalid when relative movement orthogonal to normal exceeds margin
00286                         projectedPoint = manifoldPoint.m_positionWorldOnA - manifoldPoint.m_normalWorldOnB * manifoldPoint.m_distance1;
00287                         projectedDifference = manifoldPoint.m_positionWorldOnB - projectedPoint;
00288                         distance2d = projectedDifference.dot(projectedDifference);
00289                         if (distance2d  > getContactBreakingThreshold()*getContactBreakingThreshold() )
00290                         {
00291                                 removeContactPoint(i);
00292                         } else
00293                         {
00294                                 //contact point processed callback
00295                                 if (gContactProcessedCallback)
00296                                         (*gContactProcessedCallback)(manifoldPoint,(void*)m_body0,(void*)m_body1);
00297                         }
00298                 }
00299         }
00300 #ifdef DEBUG_PERSISTENCY
00301         DebugPersistency();
00302 #endif //
00303 }
